horniness.text: When Ariane gets horny, she will take a next step on her own.(horniness: 4+)
horniness.howto: Ariane gets horny when she is a bit drunk (drinks: 4 to 6) and looses/takes of clothe or has some physical contact. But she gets also horny if you are a bit naughty and she is already open (>3)

openness.text: the more Ariane gets open the more she will agree with nudity (openness: 4) and physical contact (topcontact not nude, openness: 2+; topcontact, openness: 5; bottomcontact, openness: 6; strip here counts as contact)
openness.howto: Ariane gehts open while talking nice or funny. If she is horny (>3) she wil always be open (10) except you do some thing realy unpleasant
